Send me the details about this char. I don't want him to be an all
powerful one. Also, I'll fill you in by private email, and Cardhead
can send you his version too. =) I want no one to freak out and start
saying this is moding, okay? I'll try to make it fit with the rpg.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> O.k. Cardhead, WingedWarrior fill me in on what's
> happened to my chars.  Also I have a question that may
> take some debating.  I was thinking of introducing a
> new race of transformers not from Cybertron (no not
> the Junkions and I'm not stupid enough to try to bring
> in the Minicons), but the char I'm thinking of
> creating arguably breaks the no invincibility rule. 
> See he's the textbook case prince hiding from his evil
> uncle who wants to take over his planet, but he has
> this mark on his right hand that proves he's heir to
> the throne.  The thing is when he's pushed to far the
> symbol glows, andhe becomes invincible with limitless
> firepower, speed, and strength, but it only lasts for
> about twenty seconds then he turns back into himself,
> except then he's barely concious from the strain. 
> Still in that time he could take out three or four
> bots or render a bases shields useless.  So is this
> o.k. (please note this would be a rare occurance, not
> something that would appear in every battle).
> 
> --- "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>"
